text: Polychrysum is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family.Kovalevskaja, S. S. 1962. Flora of Uzbekistan 6:148Tropicos Polychrysum Kovalevsk. There is only one known species, Polychrysum tadshikorum, native to Afghanistan. ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Anthemideae Category:Flora of Afghanistan
title: Polychrysum
